DefiningCitation: A. (1987) The positive and negative syndrome scale (PANSS) for schizophrenia. Schizophrenia Bulletin
Positive and Negative Symptom Scale.Definition: The PANSS is an assessment of positive and negative symptoms in schizophrenia. It is a 30-item rating instrument evaluating the presence/absence and severity of positive, negative and general psychopathology of schizophrenia.
